Nov. 26, 1978 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 10 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-leicester-brass-band-festival-champ-934
The Corsair
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £175 and shield, 2nd £75 and cup, 3rd £50 and cup. 10 bands competed.
